articles.title: Citizens Stays Constructive on Oracle (ORCL) Amid Investor Confusion on OCI
articles.mainIdea: Citizens Stays Constructive on Oracle (ORCL) Amid Investor Confusion on OCI
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Citizens Stays Constructive on Oracle (ORCL) Amid Investor Confusion on OCI. Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is one of the AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On December 17, Citizens maintained its “Market Outperform” rating on the stock with a $342.00 price target. The firm remains confident in Oracle’s cloud business model, contract economics, and funding structure, despite ongoing debt-related concerns.
